item.title: Phone app to record usage
item.description: Following an idea from there, I’d like to write a small phone app to record my daily phone usage: number of times I switch the screen on number of apps used and their usage time … Ideally I would export all of that in a CSV file, and create some R scripts to plot all this (big) data.

item.title: Track podcast consumption
item.description: An idea, following the previous one: tracking my podcast consumption. I’m already using the one of PodcastAddict, but this is not detailed enough.

item.title: Website with Blogdown, Hugo, Git(hub) and Travis
item.description: I’m involved in a team organizing/stimulating technical workshops in the Marine Station of Roscoff, the so-called RUB (Roscoff Unseminars in Bio*). We needed a support to exist online, and to share resources, as well as to collectively prepare the workshops. I got very inspired by the InSileco website, that makes use of Blogdown+Hugo, GitHub and Travis-CI. They even have a blog post on how to build such website. I hereby greatly thank them for the resources they shared.

item.title: About
item.description: This small static website (built with blogdown and hugo) is a simple collection of ideas I (Ewen Corre) have. The idea followed the visit of a very similar website of the same type, created by Roel Hogervorst. As far as I know, he didn’t invent the concept either, he did the same as Sean Kross. I hope this experiment will be funny and useful!

item.title: First thought
item.description: With this short note I start my *dump of thoughts”, like Dumbledore’s Pensine. See About page for more info.
